CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Path wave frequency (X and Y control sine wave oscillation)
CONTROLS.NAME: path_a

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Path wave amplitude (X and Y set horizontal/vertical swing size)
CONTROLS.NAME: path_b

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Grid cell size in XY plane (smaller = denser grid)
CONTROLS.NAME: grid_dim_xy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Grid spacing (X: depth interval, Y: tube thickness)
CONTROLS.NAME: grid_dim_zr

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Camera travel speed through the tunnel
CONTROLS.NAME: path_speed

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Continuous rotation speed of the entire tunnel
CONTROLS.NAME: path_rot

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Spiral twist amount along the tunnel depth
CONTROLS.NAME: path_twist

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio response strength (X: bass level, Y: bass hits)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio response curve (higher = more intense reaction)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_pow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media opacity – fade visuals in or out
CONTROLS.NAME: media_opacity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media multiplier – boost opacity for bold color effects
CONTROLS.NAME: media_multiplier

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: RGB color of flash light effect on bass hits
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: RGB color of animated snake particles in the grid
CONTROLS.NAME: snake_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Camera perspective warp (X: forward pull, Y: radial pull)
CONTROLS.NAME: warp_world

DESCRIPTION: Race through an infinite tunnel of chrome and neon in the Blue Steel Grid. This audio-reactive journey features a twisting, undulating grid structure with sleek metallic surfaces that gleam with icy blue reflections. Electric purple snake particles weave through the lattice while flash lights pulse with the bass, creating dramatic light rays that pierce through the geometry. The entire grid bends and warps along a sinuous path, offering an ever-shifting perspective through this cyberpunk corridor. Perfect for techno sets and futuristic visuals.
TITLE: Blue Steel Grid
